chapter_description.p: The Trigonometric Functions module provides a comprehensive set of functions for performing trigonometric calculations in Nelson.

It includes standard trigonometric functions such as sine, cosine, and tangent, as well as their inverses and hyperbolic counterparts. The module supports angle measurements in both degrees and radians, allowing for flexible computations based on user preferences.

Additionally, the module offers utility functions for converting between degrees and radians, facilitating seamless integration of trigonometric calculations into various mathematical and engineering applications.

keyword.name: acos
keyword.description: Computes the inverse cosine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: acosd
keyword.description: Inverse cosine in degrees.

keyword.name: acosh
keyword.description: Inverse hyperbolic cosine.

keyword.name: acot
keyword.description: Inverse cotangent of angle in radians

keyword.name: acotd
keyword.description: Inverse cotangent of angle in degrees

keyword.name: acoth
keyword.description: Inverse hyperbolic cotangent.

keyword.name: acsc
keyword.description: Inverse cosecant in radians.

keyword.name: acscd
keyword.description: Inverse cosecant in degrees.

keyword.name: acsch
keyword.description: Inverse hyperbolic cosecant.

keyword.name: asec
keyword.description: Inverse secant of angle in radians.

keyword.name: asecd
keyword.description: Inverse secant of argument in degrees.

keyword.name: asech
keyword.description: Inverse hyperbolic secant of angle in radians.

keyword.name: asin
keyword.description: Computes the inverse sine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: asind
keyword.description: Inverse sine in degrees.

keyword.name: asinh
keyword.description: Inverse hyperbolic sine function

keyword.name: atan
keyword.description: Computes the inverse tangent in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: atan2
keyword.description: Computes the four-quadrant inverse tangent.

keyword.name: atan2d
keyword.description: Four-quadrant inverse tangent in degrees.

keyword.name: atand
keyword.description: Inverse tangent in degrees.

keyword.name: atanh
keyword.description: Computes the inverse hyperbolic tangent.

keyword.name: cart2pol
keyword.description: Transforms Cartesian coordinates to polar or cylindrical.

keyword.name: cart2sph
keyword.description: Transforms Cartesian to spherical coordinates.

keyword.name: cos
keyword.description: Computes the cosine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: cosd
keyword.description: Computes the cosine in degree for each element of x.

keyword.name: cosh
keyword.description: Computes the hyperbolic cosine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: cosm
keyword.description: Computes the matrix cosine of a square matrix.

keyword.name: cospi
keyword.description: Computes cos(X * pi) accurately.

keyword.name: cot
keyword.description: Cotangent of angle in radians

keyword.name: cotd
keyword.description: Cotangent of argument in degrees

keyword.name: coth
keyword.description: Hyperbolic cotangent.

keyword.name: csc
keyword.description: Cosecant of input angle in radians.

keyword.name: cscd
keyword.description: Cosecant of argument in degrees.

keyword.name: csch
keyword.description: Hyperbolic cosecant.

keyword.name: deg2rad
keyword.description: Convert angle from degrees to radians.

keyword.name: pol2cart
keyword.description: Transforms polar or cylindrical coordinates to Cartesian.

keyword.name: rad2deg
keyword.description: Convert angle from radians to degrees.

keyword.name: sec
keyword.description: Secant of angle in radians.

keyword.name: secd
keyword.description: Secant of argument in degrees.

keyword.name: sech
keyword.description: Hyperbolic secant.

keyword.name: sin
keyword.description: Computes the sine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: sind
keyword.description: Computes the sine in degree for each element of x.

keyword.name: sinh
keyword.description: Computes the hyperbolic sine in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: sinm
keyword.description: Computes the matrix sinus of a square matrix.

keyword.name: sinpi
keyword.description: Computes sin(X * pi) accurately.

keyword.name: sph2cart
keyword.description: Transform spherical coordinates to Cartesian.

keyword.name: tan
keyword.description: Computes the tangent in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: tand
keyword.description: Computes the tangent in degree for each element of x.

keyword.name: tanh
keyword.description: Computes the hyperbolic tangent in radians for each element of x.

keyword.name: tanm
keyword.description: Computes the matrix tangent of a square matrix.
